sub_title: Senior Project Control Consultant at Turner & Townsend
summary: Project Control Executive with experience in complex EPC projects with professional skills such as performing and maintaining project budget, cash flows and project cost/change controls, performs and monitors schedule updates. Expertise in subcontractors and their contract management, performance evaluation and preperation of interim payments.
